#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,ans;
    long long int s,r,x,y,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for (int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&s,&r);
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        ans=1;
        for(unsigned long long int z=0;z<n;z++)
        {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&y);
        if(max(s,x)<min(r,y))
            ans=0;
        }
        if(ans==1)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
    }
return 0;
}
